configs.title: SQL语句配置

admin_getDicType.title: 数据字典-获取字典类型

admin_getDicData.title: 数据字典-获取字典分类数据

configs.admin_editDicData: update T_DICDATA set code='#code#',name='#name#',rank='#rank#' where id='#id#'

saveAlarmRecord.title: 保存预警信息采集记录

getNewAlarmRecord.title: 获取最新的预警采集记录

configs.getNewAlarmRecord: select * from T_ALARM_RECORD order by id desc
configs.updateNowWeather: update T_WEATHER_NOW set week='#week#',weather='#weather#',icon='#iconurl#',temp='#temp#',humi='#humi#',windf='#windf#',winds='#winds#',kqzl='#kqzl#',zwx='#zwx#',pm='#pm#',rc='#rc#',rl='#rl#',updatetime='#updatetime#' where datetime='#datetime#' and stationId='#stationId#'

checkNowWeather.title: 检查当前天气数据是否入库

configs.checkNowWeather: select * from T_WEATHER_NOW where datetime='#datetime#' and stationId='#stationId#'
configs.getWeatherStations: select distinct(stationId) as stationId,t2.ename from T_USER_STATION t1,T_STATION t2 where t1.stationId=t2.id

checkDay15Weather.title: 检查15天预报数据是否存在

configs.checkDay15Weather: select * from T_WEATHER_DAY15 where datetime='#datetime#' and stationId='#stationId#'
configs.updateDay15Weather: update T_WEATHER_DAY15 set jsondata='#jsondata#',updatetime='#updatetime#' where datetime='#datetime#' and stationId='#stationId#'

checkDayGrdData.title: 检查当天格点产品数据是否存在

configs.checkDayGrdData: select * from T_STATION_GRDDATA where stationId='#stationId#' and grd_name='#grd_name#'
configs.updateGrdData: update T_STATION_GRDDATA set element_value='#element_value#',updatetime='#updatetime#' where stationId='#stationId#' and grd_name='#grd_name#'
configs.pwdQuestionList: select code,name from T_DICDATA where diccode='FINDPWD'
configs.checkUserExist: select count(1) from T_USER where username='#username#'

checkNickname.title: 检查用户昵称是否存在

configs.checkNickname: select count(1) from T_USER where nickname='#nickname#'
configs.checkLogin: select userid,username,userpwd,nickname,userimg from T_USER where username='#username#'

updateUserUsetime.title: 更新用户最后使用时间

configs.updateUserUsetime: update T_USER set last_usetime=CONVERT(varchar, getdate(), 120) where username='#username#'
configs.setStationCityCode: update T_STATION set city_code='#city_code#' where station_no='#station_no#'
configs.getUserStation: select t.stationId,t1.name,t1.station_no,t1.soil_no,t2.temp,t2.weather,t2.icon,t2.humi,t2.lotemp,t2.hitemp,t2.kqzl,t2.windf,t2.winds from T_USER_STATION t left join T_STATION t1 on t.stationId=t1.id left join T_Weather_NOW t2 on t.stationId=t2.stationId and CONVERT(varchar(10), getdate(), 120)=t2.datetime where username='#username#'
configs.addUserStation: if not exists (select * from T_USER_STATION where username='#username#' and stationid='#stationId#') insert into T_USER_STATION(username,stationId) values('#username#','#stationId#')
configs.deleteUserStation: delete from T_USER_STATION where username='#username#' and stationid='#stationid#'
configs.getNowWeather: select * from T_WEATHER_NOW where datetime=CONVERT(varchar(100), GETDATE(), 23) and stationid='#stationid#'

getTodayForecast.title: 获取今天天气预报数据

configs.getTodayForecast: select stationid,datetime,group_dir,crop_code,element_time,element_name,element_value,updatetime from T_STATION_GRDDATA where datetime=CONVERT(varchar(100), GETDATE(), 112) and stationid='#stationid#'
configs.getWeatherDay15Data: select * from T_WEATHER_DAY15 where datetime=CONVERT(varchar(100), GETDATE(), 23) and stationid='#stationid#'
configs.getAgrWeatherData: select stationid,datetime,group_dir,crop_code,element_time,element_name,element_value,updatetime from T_STATION_GRDDATA where datetime>=CONVERT(varchar(100), GETDATE(), 112) and group_dir='AgmWeather' and stationid='#stationid#' order by datetime,group_dir
configs.updateUserPwd: update T_USER set userpwd='#md5newpwd#' where username='#username#'
configs.updateUserImg: update T_USER set userimg='#userimg#' where username='#username#'
configs.updateUserNickname: update T_USER set nickname='#nickname#' where username='#username#'

getCropDisease.title: 获取农作物病虫害防治信息

configs.getCropDisease: select t.id,t.cropcode,t1.name as cropname,t.diseasename from T_CROP_DISEASE t,T_CROP t1 where t.cropcode=t1.code

getCropDiseaseInfo.title: 根据ID获取病虫害详细信息

configs.getUserFarm: select * from T_FARM where username='#username#' order by createtime desc
configs.deleteUserFarm: delete from T_FARM where id='#id#' and username='#username#'
configs.getStationAlarm: select top 1 * from T_WEATHER_ALARM where stationid='#stationid#' order by id desc
